title: Dark Angel
alternative_title: Dark Angel ; ダーク・エンジェル
status: Dark Angel ; ダーク・エンジェル
description:
Description :
        Aki is a girl who is lonely, with a lot of pain in her heart. People are always bothering her or teasing her in school. She tries being nice to them anyway, but they just won't stop.But one day, they will see a side of her they never have seen before.
